entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Flurries ending early this morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 02 February 2023
